job_description:
Company: TechCorp
Position: QA Engineer
Location: San Jose, CA (Hybrid)
Salary: $90,000 - $120,000

About Us:
TechCorp is a large technology company with a global presence. We are committed to innovation and providing our customers with the highest quality products.

Job Description:
We are seeking a QA Engineer to test our software products and ensure they meet our quality standards. You will be responsible for writing test plans and test cases, executing tests, and reporting defects.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute test plans and test cases
- Report and track defects
- Work with developers to resolve defects
- Participate in code reviews

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 2+ years of experience in software testing
- Experience with test automation tools (e.g., Selenium, JUnit)
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Agile development methodologies
- Experience with performance testing

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunity to work on a variety of projects
- Collaborative and supportive work environment
